resources.string: This is a text description of what\'s a description of this description this description must be very long. Density Independent Pixels (DIP) Android supports too many screen sizes to keep track! Using raw pixel dimensions in layouts might make your layout look good on one device and terrible on others. Android provides an ABSTRACT sizing measurement called Density Indepent Pixels that is derived from device attributes. his means that you can define layout attributes in DIPs that will look great on all Android devices. Thanks, Android! screen sizes to keep track! Using raw pixel dimensions in layouts might make your layout look good on one device and terrible on others. Android provides an ABSTRACT sizing measurement called Density Indepent Pixels that is derived from device attributes. his means that you can define layout attributes in DIPs that will look great on all Android devices. Android provides an ABSTRACT sizing measurement called Density Indepent Pixels that is derived from device attributes. his means that you can define layout attributes in DIPs that will look great on all Android devices. Thanks, Android!
